Spectra May 2023 Meet-up

Scott Fowler Local Leader,
IxDF NW Arkansas
UX Designer
Fine Artist
27 Apr, 2023 1 Min
SPECTRA

Fellowship NWA Art Ministry

Spectra NW Arkansas is hosting a meeting at the Fellowship Rogers Chapel on May 1, 2023 at 6pm to show artwork created while meditating on the book of 1 Peter. We get together to present our artwork to encourage and inspire each other.

Spectra NW Arkansas is a community of adult NWA Christian Artists-photographers, painters, graphic designers, and writers of prose and poetry—all with the same goals. If you’d like to come out and see what we’ve created.Visit SPECTRA NWA.

  • #ArtMinistry
  • #NWArkansas
  • #FellowshipBibleChurch
